hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: From large-scale general annotation to specialized medical expertise - we deliver the complete spectrum of data annotation services.

general.title: General Data Annotation Services
general.subtitle: High-volume, cost-effective annotation services powered by our 1,000-strong team in Namibia.

builtForScale.title: Built for Scale
builtForScale.description: Our core strength lies in handling large-volume annotation projects efficiently and cost-effectively. With 1,000 trained annotators in Namibia, we can scale to meet enterprise demands while maintaining Swiss quality standards.

reasons.native: Native English speakers for linguistic accuracy

expert.title: Expert & Specialist Annotation Services
expert.subtitle: Specialized teams with deep domain knowledge for complex annotation challenges.

radiology.title: Radiology & Medical Imaging
radiology.description: Expert annotation of X-rays, MRIs, CT scans with clinical accuracy

pathology.title: Pathology & Lab Data
pathology.description: Precise annotation of histopathology images and diagnostic data

clinical.title: Clinical Documentation
clinical.description: Structured annotation of medical records and clinical notes

serviceLevel.title: Choose Your Service Level
serviceLevel.subtitle: Whether you need volume or expertise, we have the right solution for your project.

swiss.title: Swiss Quality Standards
swiss.description: Zero tolerance for errors in critical data

cta.title: Not Sure Which Service You Need?
cta.subtitle: Our team can help you determine the right approach for your project. Whether it's volume or expertise you need, we'll guide you to the best solution.
